title: PublicationVolume
description: A part of a successively published publication such as a periodical or multi-volume work, often numbered. It may represent a time span, such as a year.\n\nSee also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).

allOf.description: The most generic kind of creative work, including books, movies, photographs, software programs, etc.

pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".

pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".

pagination.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd; for example, "1-6, 9, 55" or "10-12, 46-49".

volumeNumber.description: Identifies the volume of publication or multi-part work; for example, "iii" or "2".
